attributes.action: Change policy to allow the Petition Committee to debate motions of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls on the Petitions Committee and the House of Commons to change policy to allow debate regarding motions of no confidence.
attributes.background: Recently, The House of Commons Petitions Committee did not debate a vote of no confidence in David Cameron, because the Committee did not have  the power to schedule debate on motions of no confidence. We live in a DEMOCRACY and the views of the public should be heard.
